QuestData.Title: Nope
QuestData.Description: We're holding, but just barely. Anything you can do to stem the tide of dreadspinners coming up the wall would be a big help.$B$BFeel like tearing open spider eggs one at a time by hand?$B$BI didn't think so. Take one of our dragon guns and light it up down there. I wanna hear those puppies pop.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 6 Dreadspinner Tenders and use the Shado-Pan Dragon Gun to destroy 20 Dreadspinner Eggs in the Terrace of Gurthan.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work with that dragon gun. I did what I could down here, but arrows are only so useful against these things.
